name: RocketPoolFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill collects data from several public APIs and any custom news added by the community to produce about a 1 - 1.5 minute update on all things Rocket Pool. The content is updated every 30 minutes.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
